src:
光市母子殺害事件、死刑囚の再審請求退ける…広島高裁

07 Nov 2019, 11:13

　山口県光市の母子殺害事件で、殺人や強姦致死などの罪で２０１２年３月に死刑が確定した大月（旧姓・福田）孝行死刑囚（３８）の再審請求について、広島高裁が退ける決定をしていたことが、わかった。決定は６日付。
text:
Hikaichi mother and child killing case, request for retrial of death row prisoner ... Hiroshima High Court

07 Nov 2019, 11:13

Decided by Hiroshima High Court to reject retrial request of Takayuki Otsuki (38), who was sentenced to death in March 2012 due to murder, rape, death, etc. I understood that I was doing. Decision is 6th.
